name: Joe David
description:
I am easy going and fun to be with always. I love to be happy always and hard working.
I hate lies and cheat. I believe in the policy of love as two good better heads are better than one. I am loyal and reliable. I place my family at heart. I love taking walk at the water side. I want a caring, loving, God fearing and open hearted woman. I hate argument and cheat. I am always pleased with adequate communication as this is the soul of every relationship. I pray I come across my lost rib here with all sincerity and honesty.
